Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Rogue[/b] | Abilities you activate cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in those costs to less than one mana.
[b]Wizard[/b] | {9}: Draw three cards.
